content: a grand little knee warmer from a 1908 book that i ve updated with modern terms yarn and sizing tips for the size listed you ll need about 85 grams of fingering weight yarn cascade 220 fingering and knitpicks chroma both come in 100 gram skeins sizing information includes measurement details for fit of the original size so you can do a little math to see if you need more than one skein stay cozy
